help:
Greetings. I am Obibot.
Here are my available commands:
help - Prints this message.
upcoming - I'll list out the next few events on the calendar.
sudoku: I guess I've done something wrong. Shutting down.

upcoming.found_upcoming: I found a number of upcoming events:
upcoming.no_upcoming: I couldn't find any upcoming events.

announcement.upcoming: Hey everyone, just a reminder that %s will be happening in %s days!
